title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.13 - Location; grounds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 7-2.13 - Location; grounds

State Regulations
A children's camp shall be so located that adequate surface drainage can be provided during the period of operation, and so that adequate soil and space will permit the installation and operation of a proper sewage disposal system and/or water system, unless other provisions are made acceptable to the permit issuing official. Notes

7-2.13

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
